title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers via fetch.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring integrations.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate and pull models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama completions inline like GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight Next.js chat interface that streams responses from Ollama.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Clean Tauri desktop app for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, and GPU support.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module providing injectable Ollama service with RxJS streaming.

title: ollama-node
summary: Zero-dependency Node.js client for Ollama (alternative to official ollama-js).

title: ollama-py
summary: Community Python wrapper offering Pydantic models and automatic model pulling.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted writing using Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official model library: Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama and more ready-to-run Modelfiles.
